metadata.name: BLUE LAGOON
metadata.description:
A blend of oceanic blues transitioning into sweet and zesty citrus yellows. Welcome to paradise.

A 1 of 1 part of 20 meticulously handcrafted 3D sculptures part of the ever expansive PET LIGER daily Heels series, one heel artwork created every day for the time span of over 300 days and still going strong.

A feat of epic proportions and visionary craftsmanship. The iconic and ever distinctive PET LIGER DNA keeps on pushing the limits on what can be done with a single silhouette. Visually expressing the organic process of artistic problem solving and creative evolution.
